display.name: Grants - Users with granted roles
display.description: This lists users having the specified role(s), either directly or from parent role(s), and the corresponding grant chains.

query.sql: with role_chain (role, granted_role, grant_chain, grant_chain_len) as ( select role, role, role, 1 from dba_roles union all select a.role, b.granted_role, a.grant_chain || case when b.admin_option = 'YES' then ' >> ' else ' > ' end || b.granted_role, a.grant_chain_len + 1 from role_chain a, dba_role_privs b where a.granted_role = b.grantee and b.grantee in (select c.role from dba_roles c) ) select c.username, a.granted_role, c.username || case when b.admin_option = 'YES' then ' >> ' else ' > ' end || a.grant_chain as grant_chain from role_chain a, dba_role_privs b, dba_users c where (:B_GRANTED_ROLE is null or upper(a.granted_role) = upper(:B_GRANTED_ROLE)) and (:B_GRANTED_ROLE_LIKE is null or upper(a.granted_role) like upper(:B_GRANTED_ROLE_LIKE)) and (:B_GRANTED_ROLE_RE is null or regexp_like(a.granted_role, :B_GRANTED_ROLE_RE, 'i')) and b.granted_role = a.role and c.username = b.grantee and (lnnvl(upper(:B_EXCLUDE_ORA_SCHEMAS) = 'Y') or c.username not in ( 'ANONYMOUS' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'GGSYS' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'GSMCATUSER' , 'GSMUSER' , 'LBACSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'OUTLN' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' , 'SYS' , 'SYSBACKUP' , 'SYSDG' , 'SYSKM' , 'SYSRAC' , 'SYSTEM' , 'SYS$UMF' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' , 'XS$NULL' )) and (:B_USERNAME_LIKE is null or upper(c.username) like upper(:B_USERNAME_LIKE)) and (:B_USERNAME_RE is null or regexp_like(c.username, :B_USERNAME_RE, 'i')) and (:B_USERNAME_NOT_LIKE is null or upper(c.username) not like upper(:B_USERNAME_NOT_LIKE)) and (:B_USERNAME_NEG_RE is null or not regexp_like(c.username, :B_USERNAME_NEG_RE, 'i')) order by c.username, a.granted_role, a.grant_chain_len asc, a.grant_chain

bind.tooltip: If Y, Oracle schemas (predefined list) are excluded
Show only matching usernames (LIKE pattern, CI)
